ShortBio: Bhikkhu Sunyo was born in 1986 in The Netherlands.
Having practiced meditation since his mid-teens, he travelled to Perth, Australia in 2013 to train at Bodhinyana monastery.
He was subsequently ordained as a bhikkhu. He leads the Pali classes at the monastery.
